html: One veteran life lost to suicide is one too many. It is our responsibility to ensure every veteran has a place to turn when he or she needs help. That’s why I introduced legislation with @RepBost & @RepJimBanks to help improve VA's mental health and suicide prevention resources.
text:
One veteran life lost to suicide is one too many. It is our responsibility to ensure every veteran has a place to turn when he or she needs help.

That’s why I introduced legislation with @RepBost & @RepJimBanks to help improve VA's mental health and suicide prevention resources.

html: SUPPORTING RURAL VETERANS: Veterans should have access to quality care, no matter where they live. I'm fighting to protect access to Community-Based Outpatient Clinics and ensure local clinics have the resources to serve rural veterans at home in their communities.
text: SUPPORTING RURAL VETERANS: Veterans should have access to quality care, no matter where they live. I'm fighting to protect access to Community-Based Outpatient Clinics and ensure local clinics have the resources to serve rural veterans at home in their communities.

html: CONNECTING VETS WITH RESOURCES, SUPPORT: Our veterans put everything on the line to serve our country & we must ensure they have the resources and support they need when they return home - like access to safe, affordable housing, counseling services, & disability compensation.
text: CONNECTING VETS WITH RESOURCES, SUPPORT: Our veterans put everything on the line to serve our country & we must ensure they have the resources and support they need when they return home - like access to safe, affordable housing, counseling services, & disability compensation.

html: CREATING OPPORTUNITY: I'm working on the @VetAffairsDems Economic Opportunity Subcommittee to ensure Upstate NY veterans have the tools & resources they need to get a college degree, complete an apprenticeship, start a small business, or pursue other career opportunities.

html: IMPROVING HEALTH CARE IN RURAL NY: Quality, affordable health care should be available no matter your zip code. I’m working to cut burdensome taxes, like the health insurance tax, and ensure farmers have the critical mental health resources they need.
text: IMPROVING HEALTH CARE IN RURAL NY: Quality, affordable health care should be available no matter your zip code. I’m working to cut burdensome taxes, like the health insurance tax, and ensure farmers have the critical mental health resources they need.

html: CONNECTING RURAL NY: From crumbling roads and bridges to slow internet speeds, we must do more to connect rural NY with info & services. I'm working to improve broadband resources, hold cable & internet companies accountable, & prioritize bipartisan infrastructure legislation.
text: CONNECTING RURAL NY: From crumbling roads and bridges to slow internet speeds, we must do more to connect rural NY with info & services. I'm working to improve broadband resources, hold cable & internet companies accountable, & prioritize bipartisan infrastructure legislation.

html: I am glad both sides were able to work together to prevent another govt shutdown. Shutdowns hurt everyday Americans & threaten our country’s safety & security. This deal is not perfect, but it is an important step to help secure our border and keep our country safe. (1/2)

html: This week I was officially sworn in to represent New York’s 22nd District. I’m ready to get to work! You can contact our district office at (315) 927-7407 or our Washington office at (202) 225-3665. Follow along here and on Facebook at http://facebook.com/RepBrindisi  for updates!
text:
This week I was officially sworn in to represent New York’s 22nd District. I’m ready to get to work!

You can contact our district office at (315) 927-7407 or our Washington office at (202) 225-3665. 

Follow along here and on Facebook at http://facebook.com/RepBrindisi  for updates!
